author: Nintendo of America
description:
Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is available now, only on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://ninten.do/6002tGvJC

Step into the suit of Samus Aran, a lone hunter lost on an unknown planet. Fight alongside new allies to take on the threats and challenges of Viewros to find a way home.

Nintendo Switch 2 players who have Metroid Prime 4: Beyond on Nintendo Switch can upgrade to the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition by purchasing the upgrade pack.

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America

title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition — Launch Trailer
